SAN DIEGO -- Fernando Tatis Jr. will have surgery to repair the labrum in his left shoulder, he said Tuesday -- a surprise reversal of his decision to avoid surgery last offseason.
Speaking with reporters for the first time since his suspension, Tatis was con…

articles.title: Panthers' QB competition was never close, says NFL insider - Panthers Wire
articles.description: Baker Mayfield built a ‘sizable lead’ early on in the Panthers’ QB competition and never looked back. So why did they wait until now to make a decision? Here’s the answer:
articles.content: Yesterday, Baker Mayfield officially notched himself the win over Sam Darnold in the Carolina Panthers’ quarterback competition. And according to a top NFL insider, the competition was never even tha… [+2068 chars]

articles.title: No. 4 QB Chris Oladokun among 5 Steelers cuts - TribLIVE
articles.description: The Pittsburgh Steelers shed themselves of a quarterback — one who they never really bothered to watch play. Chris Oladokun was among five cuts by the Steelers announced just before Tuesday’s 4 p.m. NFL deadline to reduce preseason rosters to 80. …
